title: Model-Based Learning Design Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic learning design concepts and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: A systematic course for managers/leaders aged 40+ to master model-based approaches for designing social-context learning processes. Conducted through blended sessions (50% online, 50% offline).

learning_goals: Can analyze and apply the core elements of a learning design model (learner activities, resources, interactions).
A learning design model utilizing Domain-Specific Language (DSL) can be created and converted into a common learning environment format.
The effectiveness of model-based learning design can be continuously improved by utilizing formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
